COMMIT.MESSAGE: podmansh man page UID=$(id -u lockedu) is not allowed Switch man page to user USERID instead of UID, since UID environment variable is set at login, and is not allowed to be changed. UID=foobar bash: UID: readonly variable Fixes: https://github.com/containers/podman/issues/19646 Signed-off-by: Daniel J Walsh <dwalsh@redhat.com>
